Hello everyone,
I'm an MD at the Radboud University Medical Center. Last year I wrote an advisory report about implementing AI in Value-Based Health Care (VBHC). You can find the pdf here: Artificial-Intelligence-as-a-Driver-of-Value-in-Value-Based-Health-Care-Systems.pdf
Love to hear your impressions!
Best,
Martijn van der Meulen
martijn.vandermeulen@radboudumc.nl

In the same topic, Luciano Floridi (member of the CLAIRE IAG on Ethical, Legal and Societal issues) has just published a very interesting paper in Lancet on ethically-mindful AI for healthcare. In particular, authors call for internationally standardized ethical review guidelines. https://www.thelancet.com/journals/lancet/article/PIIS0140-6736(19)32975-7/fulltext
